webwork_xmlrpc_client.pl

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #!/usr/bin/perl -w
00002 
00003 =pod
00004 
00005 This script will take a command and an input 
00006 file.
00007 
00008 It will list available libraries, list the contents of libraries
00009 or render the input file.
00010 
00011 All of this is done by contacting the webservice.
00012 
00013 
00014 
00015 =cut
00016

00039 ####################################################
00040 # get credentials
00041 ####################################################
00042 
00043 my $credential_path;
00044 my @path_list = ('.ww_credentials', '/Users/gage/.ww_credentials', '/Users/gage/ww_session_credentials');
00045 foreach my $path (@path_list) {
00046     if (-r "$path" ) {
00047         $credential_path = $path;
00048         last;
00049     }
00050 }
00051 unless ( $credential_path ) {
00052     die <<EOF;
00053 Can't find path for credentials. Looked in @path_list.
00054 Place a credential file containing the following information at one of the locations above.
00055 %credentials = (
00056         userID          => "my login name for the webwork course",
00057         password        => "my password ",
00058         courseID        => "the name of the webwork course",
00059 );
00060 1;
00061 ---------------------------------------------------------
00062 EOF
00063 }
00064 
00065 eval{require $credential_path};
00066 if ($@  or not defined %credentials) {
00067 
00068 print STDERR <<EOF;
00069 
00070 The credentials file should contain this:
00071 %credentials = (
00072         userID          => "my login name for the webwork course",
00073         password        => "my password ",
00074         courseID        => "the name of the webwork course",
00075 );
00076 1;
00077 ---------------------------------------------------------
00078 EOF
00079 die;
00080 }

00097 ############################################
00098 # Build client
00099 ############################################
00100 our $xmlrpc_client = new WebworkClient (
00101     url                    => $XML_URL,
00102     form_action_url        => $FORM_ACTION_URL,
00103     displayMode            => DISPLAYMODE(),
00104 
00105     site_password          =>  $credentials{site_password},

00114 
00115 if (@ARGV) {
00116     my $command = $ARGV[0];
00117     my $result;
00118     print  "executing WebworkXMLRPC.$command \n\n-----------------------\n\n";
00119     given($command) {
00120         when ('renderProblem') { 
00121             if ( defined $ARGV[1])  {
00122                 if (-r $ARGV[1] ) {
00123                      $source = `cat $ARGV[1]`;
00124                      $xmlrpc_client->encodeSource($source);
00125                      my $input = { 
00126                             userID          => $credentials{userID}||'',
00127                             session_key     => $credentials{session_key}||'',
00128                             courseID        => $credentials{courseID}||'',
00129                             courseName      => $credentials{courseID}||'',
00130                             password        => $credentials{password}||'',  
00131                             site_password   => $credentials{site_password}||'',
00132                      };
00133                      #print STDERR "input is ", %$input,"\n";
00134                      $result = $xmlrpc_client->xmlrpcCall($command, $input);
00135                      print "\n\n Result of renderProblem \n\n";
00136                      print pretty_print_rh($result);
00137                 } else {
00138                     print STDERR  "Can't read source file $ARGV[1]\n";
00139                 }
00140               } else {
00141                   print STDERR "Useage: ./webwork_xmlrpc_client.pl command   <file_name>\n";
00142               }
00143         } when ('listLibraries') {
00144              my $input = { 
00145                     userID          => $credentials{userID}||'',
00146                     session_key     => $credentials{session_key}||'',
00147                     courseID    => $credentials{courseID}||'',
00148                     password        => $credentials{password}||'',  
00149                     site_password   => $credentials{site_password}||'',
00150              };
00151             # print STDERR "ww_xmlrpc_client: input for listLibraries command is ", %$input,"\n";
00152             eval {
00153                 $result = $xmlrpc_client->xmlrpcCall($command, $input);
00154             };
00155             if (defined($result) ) {
00156                 my @lib_array = @ { $result->{ra_out} };
00157                 print STDOUT "ww_xmlrpc_client: The  libraries available in course $courseID are:\n\t ", join("\n\t ", @lib_array ), "\n";
00158             } else {
00159                 print STDOUT "ww_xmlrpc_client: No libraries available for course $courseID\n";
00160             }
00161         } when ('listLib')       {
00162              $result = listLib( @ARGV );
00163              my $command = $ARGV[1];
00164              print "listLib returned\n";
00165              print pretty_print_rh($result);
00166              print "\n";
00167                                     
00168         } when ('listSets')      {
00169             $input = {      site_password    =>   'xmluser',
00170                             password         =>   $credentials{password},
00171                             userID           =>   $credentials{userID},
00172                             courseID         =>   $credentials{courseID},
00173                      };
00174             my $result   =   $xmlrpc_client->xmlrpcCall($command, $input);
00175             print pretty_print_rh($result);
00176         } when ('readFile') {
00177             print STDERR "Command $command not yet implemented\n"
00178         } when ('tex2pdf') {
00179             print STDERR "Command $command not yet implemented\n"
00180         } default {
00181             print STDERR "Command '$command' not recognized. Commands ",@COMMANDS;      
00182         }
00183     }
00184 
00185 
00186     } else {
00187 
00188     print STDERR "Useage: ./webwork_xmlrpc_client.pl command   [file_name]\n";
00189     print STDERR "For example: ./webwork_xmlrpc_client.pl renderProblem   <source file: e.g.  input.txt, bad_input.txt \n";
00190     print STDERR "For example: ./webwork_xmlrpc_client.pl  listLibraries   \n";
00191     print STDERR "For example: ./webwork_xmlrpc_client.pl listLib all \n";
00192     print STDERR "For example: ./webwork_xmlrpc_client.pl listLib setsOnly \n";
00193     print STDERR "For example: ./webwork_xmlrpc_client.pl listLib listSet <setID: e.g. set0> \n";
00194     print STDERR "Commands are: ", join(" ", @COMMANDS), "\n";
00195     
00196 }

00201 sub source {
00202     return "" unless $source;
00203     return encode_base64($source);
00204 }
00205 sub listLib {
00206     my @ARGS = @_;
00207     #print "args for listLib are ", join(" ", @ARGS), "\n";
00208     my $result;
00209     given($ARGS[1]) { 
00210         when ("all") { 
00211             $input = {                  site_password    =>   'xmluser',
00212                                         password         =>   $credentials{password},
00213                                         userID           =>   $credentials{userID},
00214                                         courseID         =>   $credentials{courseID},
00215                                         command          =>   'all',
00216                                 };
00217             $result = $xmlrpc_client->xmlrpcCall("listLib", $input);
00218         } 
00219         when ('dirOnly') { 
00220             my %options = @ARGS[2..$#ARGS];
00221             my $path = $options{-path} || '';
00222             my $maxdepth = defined($options{-depth}) ? $options{-depth}: 10000;
00223             $input = {                  site_password    =>   'xmluser',
00224                                         password         =>   $credentials{password},
00225                                         userID           =>   $credentials{userID},
00226                                         courseID         =>   $credentials{courseID},
00227                                         command          =>   'dirOnly',
00228                                         dirPath          =>   $path,
00229                                         maxdepth         =>   $maxdepth,
00230                                 };
00231             $result = $xmlrpc_client->xmlrpcCall("listLib", $input);
00232         } 
00233         when('files') { 
00234             if ($ARGS[2]  ) { 
00235                 my %options = @ARGS[2..$#ARGS];
00236                 my $path    = $options{-path} || ''; 
00237                 $input = {      site_password    =>   'xmluser',
00238                                 password         =>   $credentials{password},
00239                                 userID           =>   $credentials{userID},
00240                                 courseID         =>   $credentials{courseID},
00241                                 command          =>   'files',
00242                                 dirPath          =>   $path,
00243                             };
00244                 $result = $xmlrpc_client->xmlrpcCall("listLib", $input);
00245             } else {
00246                 print STDERR "Usage:  webwork_xmlrpc_client listLib files  <path to directory >\n";
00247                 $result = "";                           
00248             }
00249         } 
00250         default {print "The possible arguments for listLib are:".  
00251                         "\n\t all -- print all paths". 
00252                         "\n\t dirOnly [options]-- print only directories below Library/path".
00253                         "\n\t\t options:  -depth depth  -path directoryPath".
00254                         "\n\t\t\t depth counts the number of slashes in the relative path".
00255                         "\n\t files <path_to_directory> -- print .pg files in the given directory \n".
00256                         "\n\t\t options:    -path directoryPath";
00257                   $result = "";
00258         }
00259     }
00260     return $result;
00261 }
00262 sub pretty_print_rh { 
00263     shift if UNIVERSAL::isa($_[0] => __PACKAGE__);
00264     my $rh = shift;
00265     my $indent = shift || 0;
00266     my $out = "";
00267     my $type = ref($rh);
00268 
00269     if (defined($type) and $type) {
00270         $out .= " type = $type; ";
00271     } elsif (! defined($rh )) {
00272         $out .= " type = UNDEFINED; ";
00273     }
00274     return $out." " unless defined($rh);
00275     
00276     if ( ref($rh) =~/HASH/ or "$rh" =~/HASH/ ) {
00277         $out .= "{\n";
00278         $indent++;
00279         foreach my $key (sort keys %{$rh})  {
00280             $out .= "  "x$indent."$key => " . pretty_print_rh( $rh->{$key}, $indent ) . "\n";
00281         }
00282         $indent--;
00283         $out .= "\n"."  "x$indent."}\n";
00284 
00285     } elsif (ref($rh)  =~  /ARRAY/ or "$rh" =~/ARRAY/) {
00286         $out .= " ( ";
00287         foreach my $elem ( @{$rh} )  {
00288             $out .= pretty_print_rh($elem, $indent);
00289         
00290         }
00291         $out .=  " ) \n";
00292     } elsif ( ref($rh) =~ /SCALAR/ ) {
00293         $out .= "scalar reference ". ${$rh};
00294     } elsif ( ref($rh) =~/Base64/ ) {
00295         $out .= "base64 reference " .$$rh;
00296     } else {
00297         $out .=  $rh;
00298     }
00299     
00300     return $out." ";
00301 }
00302 
00303 sub pretty_print_json { 
00304     shift if UNIVERSAL::isa($_[0] => __PACKAGE__);
00305     my $rh = shift;
00306     my $indent = shift || 0;
00307     my $out = "";
00308     my $type = ref($rh);
00309 
00310     if (defined($type) and $type) {
00311         $out .= " type = $type; ";
00312     } elsif (! defined($rh )) {
00313         $out .= " type = UNDEFINED; ";
00314     }
00315     return $out." " unless defined($rh);
00316     
00317     if ( ref($rh) =~/HASH/ or "$rh" =~/HASH/ ) {
00318         $out .= "{\n";
00319         $indent++;
00320         foreach my $key (sort keys %{$rh})  {
00321             $out .= "  "x$indent."$key => " . pretty_print_json( $rh->{$key}, $indent ) . "\n";
00322         }
00323         $indent--;
00324         $out .= "\n"."  "x$indent."}\n";
00325 
00326     } elsif (ref($rh)  =~  /ARRAY/ or "$rh" =~/ARRAY/) {
00327         $out .= " ( ";
00328         foreach my $elem ( @{$rh} )  {
00329             $out .= pretty_print_json($elem, $indent);
00330         
00331         }
00332         $out .=  " ) \n";
00333     } elsif ( ref($rh) =~ /SCALAR/ ) {
00334         $out .= "scalar reference ". ${$rh};
00335     } elsif ( ref($rh) =~/Base64/ ) {
00336         $out .= "base64 reference " .$$rh;
00337     } else {
00338         my $jsonString = $rh;
00339         $jsonString =~ s/(\\|\/)/\./g;
00340         $out .=  "Library.".$jsonString.";";
00341     }
00342     
00343     return $out." ";
00344 }
